quote: Your journey to UPSC is the most beautiful story I’ve ever been a part of — and I’m proud to be your biggest fan. 📖❤️
You might be chasing a rank, but to me, you’re already number one. 🏆💕
The only thing stronger than your willpower is my love and belief in you. 💘💪
UPSC tests knowledge, but love tests patience — and I’ll pass both for you. 📚❤️
Your focus is fierce, your heart is gold, and your future is legendary. I’m just lucky to witness it. 🌟📜
Every highlighter mark, every scribbled note — it’s all part of the masterpiece that is you. 🎨📘
The only thing I want more than your name in the final list — is your name next to mine. 💍✨
You handle pressure like a pro, and love like a poet. Keep going, my favorite warrior. 🧠❤️
You’re solving India’s problems by day and stealing my heart by night. 🫶🇮🇳
Love and UPSC prep have one thing in common: both need consistency, and I’m with you in both. 📅❤️
For the world, you’ll be an IAS. For me, you’re already everything I could ever ask for. 🌎💖
Every revision brings you closer to UPSC. Every smile brings me closer to you. 😇📚
The Parliament has powers, but your eyes have more — they motivate me more than Article 368 ever could. 😍📜
You’re the only topper I want in my life — in results and in love. 💯💞
